info.title: MediFlow Lite
info.description: Healthcare automation system with offline-first capabilities

post.description:
OAuth2 compatible token login.

Returns access and refresh tokens.

JSON-based login endpoint.

Alternative to OAuth2 form-based login.
Refresh access token using refresh token.

Register a new user.

Only accessible by admin users.

get.description:
List all patients with pagination and search.

Accessible by all authenticated users.

post.description:
Create a new patient.

Accessible by admin, doctor, and receptionist roles.

get.description:
Get a specific patient by ID.

Accessible by all authenticated users.

put.description:
Update an existing patient.

Accessible by admin, doctor, and receptionist roles.

delete.description:
Delete a patient.

Only accessible by admin role.

get.description: List appointments with pagination and filtering.
Get a specific appointment by ID.

delete.description: Delete an appointment (admin or doctor only).

post.description:
Check doctor availability for a specific date.
Returns available time slots.

get.description: List invoices with pagination and filtering.
Get a specific invoice by ID.

post.description: Record a payment for an invoice.

get.description: Generate a PDF for an invoice.
List prescriptions with pagination and filtering.
Get a specific prescription by ID.
Generate a PDF for a prescription.
List lab results with pagination and filtering.
Get a specific lab result by ID.

post.description: Mark a lab result as reviewed by a doctor.

get.description: Generate a PDF for a lab result.
Get hospital settings (returns first record or creates default).

post.description:
AI-powered symptom triage.

Analyzes patient symptoms and provides urgency assessment and recommendations.

AI-powered medical transcription.

Converts consultation notes into structured medical documentation.

get.description: Check if AI service is available.

Export all patient data (GDPR Right to Data Portability).

Returns a JSON file with all patient information.

post.description:
Anonymize patient data (GDPR Right to be Forgotten).

Only accessible by admin role.

get.description: Get patient consent status for data processing.

delete.description:
Delete data older than retention period.

Only accessible by admin role.
